resources.string: Perform a long-press on a free spot on your homescreen
In the next dialog, choose to add a Widget to your homescreen
In the list of widgets, choose Anton\'s Calendar Widget in the size that suits you (I like 4x2 best :D)
...and you\'re done. To change the widget\'s appearance of the just touch it and pick settings .

Hi there! My name is Anton Wolf, I\'m a 20-year-old student of Business Informatics from Germany and I\'ve written this app in my free time. You can use this app and even take a look at it\'s source code, all for free! If you like what I did and you want to support me, please consider doing one of the following:
